CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 7, 1956, pg. 3, reads: "Best Wishes - Thomas J. Smith, new constable of the Fifth Ward, is surrounded by a group of friends after he was sworn into office on Dec. 30 in the office of the Prothonotary David B. Roberts. Reading from left to right are William (Bill) Miller, Jake Williams, Archie Barnett, William Bowles, Helen Dunham, Mr. Roberts, Pronty Ford, Constable Smith, John J. Fortney, Harry Cruse, Adrena Allen, 'Buzzy' Gloster and Pete Morrone. After administering the oath to Constable Smith, Mr. Roberts remarked: 'I am glad to give you this oath, and as far as I am concerned, will never ask you to do anything to violate it. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: William "Bill" Miller, Jake Williams, Archie Barnett, William Bowles, Helen Dunham, Prothonotary David B. Roberts, Pronty Ford, Constable Thomas "Tommy" Smith, John J. Fortney, Harry Cruse, Adrena Allen, 'Buzzy' Gloster and Pete Morrone posed in Robert's office after swearing in of Constable Smith
